targets.expr: (count(sum by (server,host) (clamp(http_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 0)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(dns_query_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 0)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (url,host) (clamp(ping_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 0)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(net_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 0)) or vector(0))

(count(sum by (server,host) (clamp(http_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 1)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(dns_query_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 1)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (url,host) (clamp(ping_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 1)) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(net_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1) == 1)) or vector(0))

panels.title: Certs that are about to expire

targets.expr: (count(sum by (server,host) (clamp(http_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1))) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(dns_query_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1))) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (url,host) (clamp(ping_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1))) or vector(0)) + (count(sum by (server,record_type,domain,host) (clamp(net_response_result_code{host=~"$host"},0,1))) or vector(0))
